T02TD2593E:11b-42: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgya dang /
T02TD2593E:11b-43: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2593E:11b-45: 'phags pa nyan thos yang dag par song ba dang /
T02TD2593E:11b-46: yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2593E:11b-47: sems can thams cad kyi tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2593E:11b-48: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2593E:11b-49: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol bar 'tshal lo //
T02TD2593E:11b-50: de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2593E:12a-0: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag @12a * //
T02TD2593E:12a-3: rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol /
T02TD2593E:12a-4: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol /
T02TD2593E:12a-5: bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
T02TD2593E:12a-6: 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog //
T02TD2593E:12a-7: 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
T02TD2593E:12a-8: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las dgrol //
T02TD2593E:12a-9: zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la /
T02TD2593E:12a-10: de nas ba stong pa ni 'khrugs bsdeb par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:12a-11: tshigs bcad glu yis bstod par bya //
T02TD2593E:12a-12: byang chub sems ni rang 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2593E:12a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs bcad sum cu rtsa gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstod pa ston pa ni /
T02TD2593E:12a-14: tshigs bcad glu yis bstod par bya //
T02TD2593E:12a-15: byang chub sems ni rang 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2593E:12a-17: / don chen yi ge dam pa yin /
T02TD2593E:12a-18: mchog spyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12a-19: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02TD2593E:12a-20: gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //
T02TD2593E:12a-21: mgon pos bcu'i dbang phyug ste //
T02TD2593E:12a-22: rdo rje chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12a-24: gdong drug mig drug lag drug po //
T02TD2593E:12a-25: mche gtsigs gdong brgya kun 'dul ba //
T02TD2593E:12a-26: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12a-27: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02TD2593E:12a-28: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
T02TD2593E:12a-29: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //
T02TD2593E:12a-30: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12a-31: 'dod pa'i don grub ngan song sbyong //
T02TD2593E:12a-32: mgon po nyon mongs dra ba 'joms ;
T02TD2593E:12a-33: / sa gzhi tshangs gnas rkang bas gnon //
T02TD2593E:12a-35: sangs rgyas byang chub rtogs bya ba //
T02TD2593E:12a-36: thig le chen po yi ge med //
T02TD2593E:12a-37: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD2593E:12a-38: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12a-39: me long ye shes ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2593E:12a-40: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02TD2593E:12a-41: sems ma rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12a-42: mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2593E:12a-44: tshig tu brjod pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD2593E:12a-46: so sor kun rtog ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2593E:12a-47: aa ni brjod pa'i rgyu yin te //
T02TD2593E:12b-0: brjod @12b ba kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / chos kyi rdo rje 'dzum khyod 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-1: bya ba nan tan ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2593E:12b-2: aa ni tshig 'bru gsal bar byed //
T02TD2593E:12b-3: tshig kun gsal bar byed pa yi //
T02TD2593E:12b-4: rdo rje dra ba khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-5: stong ba rang bzhin 'dod chags che //
T02TD2593E:12b-7: phyi nyid ma grub bde ba che //
T02TD2593E:12b-9: gnyi ga med par dga' ba che //
T02TD2593E:12b-10: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-11: stong pa'i don ldan mgu ba che //
T02TD2593E:12b-12: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-13: gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
T02TD2593E:12b-15: kha dog che la gzi brjid ldan //
T02TD2593E:12b-16: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-17: ming che mtshan bzangs rgya che ba //
T02TD2593E:12b-19: bzhad cing dkyil 'khor yangs khyab pa //
T02TD2593E:12b-20: sangs rgyas bzhad ba khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-21: chos kyi shes rab mtshan 'chang ba //
T02TD2593E:12b-22: sangs rgyas gsung pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-23: nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa'i mchog / sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-24: grags pa rdo rje rgyu yi bdag / nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-25: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //
T02TD2593E:12b-26: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-29: sgyu 'phrul chen po go cha sra //
T02TD2593E:12b-30: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-31: sgyu 'phrul bdag nyid gnod spyin gtso //
T02TD2593E:12b-32: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-33: sgyu 'phrul khu tshur brtan zhing sdud //
T02TD2593E:12b-34: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-35: spyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
T02TD2593E:12b-36: rdo rje sgeg mo khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-37: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog / rdo rje dpal phred khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-38: bzod chen 'chang ba ston pa po //
T02TD2593E:12b-39: rdo rje dbyangs mkhan khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-40: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yi //
T02TD2593E:12b-41: rdo rje gar mkhan khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-42: bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2593E:12b-43: rdo rje me tog khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-44: shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba //
T02TD2593E:12b-45: rdo rje bdug pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-46: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste //
T02TD2593E:12b-47: rdo rje mar me gsal la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-48: stobs po che la thabs che ba //
T02TD2593E:12b-49: rdo rje dag byed khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:12b-50: rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren pa che //
T02TD2593E:13a-0: @13a * // rdo rje zhags pa rnam par rgyal //
T02TD2593E:13a-2: rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa che //
T02TD2593E:13a-3: rdo rje sdom byed khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:13a-4: rdo rje 'bebs pa rnam rgyal zhabs //
T02TD2593E:13a-6: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
T02TD2593E:13a-7: snying rje chen po blo yi mchog / shes rab chen po blo chen ldan //
T02TD2593E:13a-8: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //
T02TD2593E:13a-9: ye shes cha grub sems dpa'i tshogs //
T02TD2593E:13a-10: stong pa nyid kyi sgor gnas ba //
T02TD2593E:13a-11: bdag la nyal la byams sems can //
T02TD2593E:13a-12: shes rab snying rjer ldan la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:13a-13: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan //
T02TD2593E:13a-14: shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste //
T02TD2593E:13a-15: rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa //
T02TD2593E:13a-16: stobs chen pha rol gnon ba po //
T02TD2593E:13a-17: stobs chen rdzu 'phrul bzhir ldan pa'i //
T02TD2593E:13a-18: gom shugs ye shes bzhir ldan pa //
T02TD2593E:13a-19: rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs kyis gnon //
T02TD2593E:13a-20: tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:13a-21: srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms //
T02TD2593E:13a-22: mkhrigs shing rdo rje chen po 'dzin //
T02TD2593E:13a-23: drag po chen po mun pa 'joms //
T02TD2593E:13a-25: phung po lnga dag lha chen 'dul //
T02TD2593E:13a-26: mi shes ri 'joms sra ba po //
T02TD2593E:13a-27: mya ngan kun sel drag po ste //
T02TD2593E:13a-28: che bas che ba khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:13a-29: mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste //
T02TD2593E:13a-30: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog / theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
T02TD2593E:13a-31: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /'khor ba mya ngan skyob pa'i mchog / theg pa'i tshul mchog lam gnas pa'i //
T02TD2593E:13a-32: phyag rgya'i mchog tu grub byed pa'i //
T02TD2593E:13a-33: pha rol sa bcu gtso la 'dud //
T02TD2593E:13a-34: 'dud nyi shu dang spyi bstod kyis kyang bstod /
T02TD2593E:13a-35: de ltar bstod pa byed pa de //
T02TD2593E:13a-37: ches ba rkang pa gnyis kyis bstod pa byas pa'i phan yon ston te /
T02TD2593E:13a-38: de ltar bstod pas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad dang mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:13a-39: dgyes nas bdag la lha rnams kyis //
T02TD2593E:13a-40: snyan pa'i tshig gis bstod par bsam //
T02TD2593E:13a-41: zhes bya ba rkang ba gnyis kyis lha rnams kyis bdag la bstod par ston te /
T02TD2593E:13b-0: lha rnams thams cad kyi zhal nas rigs kyi bu bdag gzhan gyi don du lha rnams la bstod pa @13b legs so legs so zhes gsungs par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:13b-1: drin gyi tshul gyis slar bstod pa //
T02TD2593E:13b-2: zhes pa rkang ba gcig gis slar yang lha rnams la bdag gis drin la lan gyi tshul gyis bstod pa thams cad dam /
T02TD2593E:13b-4: de dag ni mchog gi rgyal po sbyor ba dang po'i 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2593E:13b-5: de nas rim pa 'di ldan pas //
T02TD2593E:13b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa brgyang rkang pa gsum gyis yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston te /
T02TD2593E:13b-7: phyag bya zhing smon pa byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed sdom pa gzung ba dang /
T02TD2593E:13b-8: 'jug pa byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed pa /
T02TD2593E:13b-9: ye shes lnga bsgom ba ston te /
T02TD2593E:13b-10: go sla ba'i phyir 'dir ma spros so //
T02TD2593E:13b-11: de nas de la mngon 'byung gzugs //
T02TD2593E:13b-13: de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ston te /
T02TD2593E:13b-14: rdo rje dang mchod rten dang chos 'byung dang rgya gram dang /
T02TD2593E:13b-15: gzhal yas khang dang gdan rnams bskyed pa ston pa'o //
T02TD2593E:13b-17: de nas yi ge rdzogs pa las //
T02TD2593E:13b-18: zhes bya bas chos 'byung nang du yi ge aa kha dog sna tshogs pa'am kha dog sna tshogs pa'am kha dog dkar pos sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par 'brel to //
T02TD2593E:13b-19: de yang slob dpon la la dag rgya gram khong stong du 'dod la /
T02TD2593E:13b-20: 'dir sa gzhi'i tshul du brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:13b-21: de nas rkyen gyis slong ba ni //
T02TD2593E:13b-22: zhes pa nas dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhi'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2593E:13b-23: dang po'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2593E:13b-24: de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa //
T02TD2593E:13b-26: shar la sogs pa'i zhal bzhi ni sngon po dang /
T02TD2593E:13b-30: steng gi zhal ni lha zhal dkar po'am /
T02TD2593E:13b-31: rta zhal dkar po la rngog ma sngon po can no dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru //
T02TD2593E:13b-32: zhes pa nas de dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i rim pa ba stan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa rnams ston te /
T02TD2593E:13b-33: rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:14a-0: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i ngo bo nyid gsang sngags kyi sgo nas de dag gi rim pa bskyed par bya ste @14a * //
T02TD2593E:14a-2: de dag ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa'i bar gyis lha bsgom zhing dbyung ba dang /
T02TD2593E:14a-3: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed pa ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2593E:14a-4: dkyus ma nyid gsal ba'i phyir 'dir ma bkrol lo //
T02TD2593E:14a-5: 'on kyang sngags don rnam par gzigs pa las dkyil 'khor drug tu gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2593E:14a-6: gsang ldan 'di nyid las sngon du shes rab kyi 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du gsungs pas /
T02TD2593E:14a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi lhag ma gzhan yang bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:14a-8: mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab kyi mtshan brjod pas /
T02TD2593E:14a-9: dkyil 'khor ba rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa'am ;
T02TD2593E:14a-10: yang na rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas cig car du sprul pa'o //
T02TD2593E:14a-11: de yang thabs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis dang /
T02TD2593E:14a-12: thabs khyad par gyi dkyil 'khor lnga dang bdun du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:14a-13: gsang ldan 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i khongs su bsdu'o //
T02TD2593E:14a-14: khyad par gyi ni gzhal yas khang sgo gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2593E:14a-15: de nas las kyi khyad par yang //
T02TD2593E:14a-16: bskyed pa'i zhar las byung ba ste //
T02TD2593E:14a-17: sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas //
T02TD2593E:14a-18: 'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02TD2593E:14a-19: las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pas /
T02TD2593E:14a-20: las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2593E:14a-21: de nas las kyi khyad par yang //
T02TD2593E:14a-22: bskyed pa'i zhar las 'byung ba ste //
T02TD2593E:14a-24: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed nas las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par dam bcas pa'o //
T02TD2593E:14a-25: sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas //
T02TD2593E:14a-26: 'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02TD2593E:14a-27: zhes bya ba las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bla mas shes par bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2593E:14a-28: bla ma'i man ngag ni bcu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:14a-30: rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2593E:14a-31: mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' byon te /
T02TD2593E:14a-32: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal ba dang /
T02TD2593E:14a-34: spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2593E:14a-35: sgos bkur gyi gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2593E:14a-39: lha las spyar ba'i rim par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:14a-40: de la de yang las mkhan rang byed la /
T02TD2593E:14b-1: dang po sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal gyis sdigs mdzub kyi se gol gtogs shing /
T02TD2593E:14b-3: sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:14b-4: yang na bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug par bsams te /
T02TD2593E:14b-5: khro bo h'um mdzad du bsgoms la khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2593E:14b-6: mdzub mo gnyis lto sprad la drug tu brdabs pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2593E:14b-7: aom badzro dgha ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
T02TD2593E:14b-8: zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:14b-10: de nas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni /
T02TD2593E:14b-11: sgrub pa po'i snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /
T02TD2593E:14b-12: mthe bo dang mdzub mo la zla ba'i steng du dza:bsams la /
T02TD2593E:14b-13: lag ngar gnyis rdo rje rgya gram gyi tshul du bsnol te /
T02TD2593E:14b-14: dpung pa gnyis su se gol gtogs shing /
T02TD2593E:14b-15: rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po //
T02TD2593E:14b-16: aom badzra sa m'a dza:dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2593E:14b-18: mtheb mdzub kyi dza:las ye shes kyi 'od zer lcags kyu lta bur 'phros te /
T02TD2593E:14b-19: rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig pa dang 'dra ba byon par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:14b-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bdag / lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rjer bcing //
T02TD2593E:14b-22: rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis //
T02TD2593E:14b-23: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya ;
T02TD2593E:14b-25: byon te phyag 'tshal ba ba stan pa ni /
T02TD2593E:14b-26: de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2593E:14b-28: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta /
T02TD2593E:14b-29: pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro m'i /
T02TD2593E:14b-30: zhes brjod cing dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal bar bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:14b-31: de nas ched du brjod pa ni //
T02TD2593E:14b-32: ae ma'o kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po yi //
T02TD2593E:14b-33: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02TD2593E:14b-34: dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes //
T02TD2593E:14b-35: zhes ched du brjod par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:14b-36: de nas spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02TD2593E:14b-37: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor nas spyan drangs pa'i lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum po thams cad /
T02TD2593E:14b-38: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs kar zhugs nas /
T02TD2593E:15a-0: spyi'i gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis @15a * //
T02TD2593E:15a-2: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi lha tshogs 'thon te nam mkha' la gnas so //
T02TD2593E:15a-3: de nas sgos bkur ba'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02TD2593E:15a-4: ae ma sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02TD2593E:15a-5: rgya chen gdod nas skye ba min //
T02TD2593E:15a-6: rdul phran ji snyed thams cad kyi //
T02TD2593E:15a-7: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //
T02TD2593E:15a-9: shar phyogs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi lha tshogs ni mi bskyod pa'i thugs kar zhugs te /
T02TD2593E:15a-10: mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2593E:15a-11: mi bskyod pa'i thugs ka nas slar 'thon te /
T02TD2593E:15a-12: rang rang gi dam tshig gi lha byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15a-13: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs kyang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:15a-14: de nas dbang nod pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:15a-15: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa dang /
T02TD2593E:15a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sgrub pa pos dbang nod pa'o ;
T02TD2593E:15a-17: / dam tshig la ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa ni /
T02TD2593E:15a-18: rigs lnga la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15a-19: de nas rigs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug mchod pa brgyang yum bzhi sgo ba dang sum cu rtsa gnyis la sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam /
T02TD2593E:15a-20: bskal ba bzang po'i sems dpa' rnams la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15a-21: de nas sgrub po pos dbang nod pa ni /
T02TD2593E:15a-23: ye shes pa rnams dam tshig pa rnams kyi thugs ka nas slar 'thon te /
T02TD2593E:15a-24: gdan re re la snang ba gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs pa la /
T02TD2593E:15a-25: sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i dbang lnga'am drug nos nas /
T02TD2593E:15a-26: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de slar thim par bsams pa'am /
T02TD2593E:15a-27: yang na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2593E:15a-28: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu 'dres nas bzhugs pa la /
T02TD2593E:15a-29: sgrub pa pos dbang nos par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15a-30: ye shes ba slar 'thon te nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15a-31: de yang dbang gis dbang rtags ni /
T02TD2593E:15a-32: sgrub pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam /
T02TD2593E:15a-33: sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na /
T02TD2593E:15b-0: @15b de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15b-1: de nas sgrub pa pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
T02TD2593E:15b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na /
T02TD2593E:15b-3: yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15b-4: sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na /
T02TD2593E:15b-5: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa yum bzhis byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15b-6: de nas ye shes dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing pa dang dgyes par bya ba ni /
T02TD2593E:15b-7: sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drang ba ste /
T02TD2593E:15b-8: de yang rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas nang du bkug par bsam /
T02TD2593E:15b-9: rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcug par bsam /
T02TD2593E:15b-10: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcings par bsam /
T02TD2593E:15b-11: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas mnyes par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15b-12: de nas phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni gnyis te /
T02TD2593E:15b-15: rgyas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:15b-17: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab pa /
T02TD2593E:15b-18: sgrub pa bo'i snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2593E:15b-19: gtso bo'i sngags rings kyi mjug la /
T02TD2593E:15b-20: dri shya dza:h'um bam ho:sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2593E:15b-24: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15b-25: chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02TD2593E:15b-26: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ljags kyi steng du h'um dkar po las yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa re chu rgyugs su yod par bsam /
T02TD2593E:15b-27: de'i lte ba la lha rnams rang rang gi sku skyed pa'i yig 'bru bkod la /
T02TD2593E:15b-28: chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:15b-29: las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02TD2593E:15b-30: sgrub pa po'i snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2593E:15b-31: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2593E:15b-32: rdo rje'i gar dgu sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis /
T02TD2593E:15b-33: phyag mtshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs bsgom pa ni /
T02TD2593E:15b-34: las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab po //
T02TD2593E:15b-35: phyag mtshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni /
T02TD2593E:16a-1: kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste /
T02TD2593E:16a-2: rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te //
T02TD2593E:16a-3: mnyam par gzhag pas gnyis su bya //
T02TD2593E:16a-4: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2593E:16a-5: de nas bcing ba rab tu bshad //
T02TD2593E:16a-6: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02TD2593E:16a-7: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02TD2593E:16a-8: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
T02TD2593E:16a-9: sangs rgyas byang chub spyin byed pa'o //
T02TD2593E:16a-10: mi g-yo ba yis reg pa'o //
T02TD2593E:16a-11: rin chen gyi ni mchog spyin pa'o //
T02TD2593E:16a-12: tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin mchog / gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs spyin //
T02TD2593E:16a-13: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2593E:16a-14: mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya //
T02TD2593E:16a-15: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2593E:16a-16: rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste //
T02TD2593E:16a-17: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yin //
T02TD2593E:16a-18: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang //
T02TD2593E:16a-19: mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni //
T02TD2593E:16a-20: legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis //
T02TD2593E:16a-21: snying gar nyi ma ba stan par bya //
T02TD2593E:16a-22: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
T02TD2593E:16a-23: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02TD2593E:16a-24: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon par dbye //
T02TD2593E:16a-25: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri mdud //
T02TD2593E:16a-26: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02TD2593E:16a-27: rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2593E:16a-28: rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yi //
T02TD2593E:16a-29: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag / go cha mthe chung mche ba dang //
T02TD2593E:16a-30: khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //
T02TD2593E:16a-31: rdo rje bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02TD2593E:16a-32: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02TD2593E:16a-33: phreng ba bcings dang kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2593E:16a-34: rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin //
T02TD2593E:16a-35: rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2593E:16a-36: bdug pa la sogs de bzhin spyin ;
T02TD2593E:16a-37: / sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi //
T02TD2593E:16a-38: phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa po //
T02TD2593E:16a-39: mdzub mos lcags kyu bcings pa ni //
T02TD2593E:16a-40: mthe chung las de lcags kyu che //
T02TD2593E:16a-41: mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis mdud //
T02TD2593E:16a-42: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02TD2593E:16a-44: gsum pa la sogs pa lnga'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni /
T02TD2593E:16a-45: so so'i gtso bo bzhin du thabs re sgo re'am /
T02TD2593E:16a-47: de rnams ni 'dir mang du spro mi dgos pa'i phyir mang du ma spros pa'o /
T02TD2593E:16a-49: // / de nas phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02TD2593E:16a-50: sgrub pa po'i snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2593E:16b-0: @16b rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02TD2593E:16b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po //
T02TD2593E:16b-2: aom h'um hr'i: zhes yid la zlos shing /
T02TD2593E:16b-3: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rdo rje gar ma byas par /
T02TD2593E:16b-4: rang rang gi phyag mtshan phyag na bsnams par bsgom pa ni /
T02TD2593E:16b-5: phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab par bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2593E:16b-6: de las lha las la spyar ba ni /
T02TD2593E:16b-8: de nas las kyi rgyal mchog ni //
T02TD2593E:16b-9: sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas //
T02TD2593E:16b-10: 'dir ni bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02TD2593E:16b-13: gsang ldan nam sgo dang po'i lha las la gzhag pa ni /
T02TD2593E:16b-14: lha'i dag pa dang mthun par las la gzhag ste /
T02TD2593E:16b-15: sngags don rnam par gzigs pa'i lha'i dag pa dang mthun no //
T02TD2593E:16b-16: sgo gnyis pa'i gti mug sel ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2593E:16b-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis /
T02TD2593E:16b-18: sems can thams cad kyi gti mug sbyongs shig pa'o //
T02TD2593E:16b-19: de bzhin du zhe sdang dang ;
T02TD2593E:16b-23: yang na sngon gyi lha thams cad kyi spro bsdu dran par byas pa ni las la spyar ba'o //
T02TD2593E:16b-24: las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa ni /
T02TD2593E:16b-26: de nas spos kyi chu dag la //
T02TD2593E:16b-27: sngags bzlas pa yis bsang byas te //
T02TD2593E:16b-28: phung pos bsdu pa'i mchod pa lngas //
T02TD2593E:16b-29: rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas //
T02TD2593E:16b-31: se gol rim pas brdab byas pas //
T02TD2593E:16b-32: rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2593E:16b-34: mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas //
T02TD2593E:16b-36: 'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la //
T02TD2593E:16b-37: mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya //
T02TD2593E:16b-38: de nas gtso bo sngags rings la //
T02TD2593E:16b-39: dri shya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing //
T02TD2593E:16b-40: aa ham zhes dang ldan par ni //
T02TD2593E:16b-41: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog sgrub //
T02TD2593E:16b-42: de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2593E:16b-43: mchod nas phyag bzhi bya ba ni //
T02TD2593E:16b-44: dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2593E:16b-45: gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2593E:16b-46: de dag ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2593E:16b-47: de dag ni yang spyi don dgu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:17a-2: sngags bzlas pa yis bsang bya ste //
T02TD2593E:17a-3: phung pos ba sdus pa'i mchod pa lnga //
T02TD2593E:17a-4: rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas //
T02TD2593E:17a-6: mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa ston te /
T02TD2593E:17a-7: spyir spyang zhing sreg pa dang /
T02TD2593E:17a-8: sgo sgo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2593E:17a-10: 'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis //
T02TD2593E:17a-11: se gol rim par brdab byas pas //
T02TD2593E:17a-12: rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2593E:17a-14: mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas //
T02TD2593E:17a-16: rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba ston to //
T02TD2593E:17a-17: de yang rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs la mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:17a-18: sa m'a dza:zhes brjod bya zhing //
T02TD2593E:17a-19: 'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la //
T02TD2593E:17a-20: mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya //
T02TD2593E:17a-21: zhes pas bstod pa ston te /
T02TD2593E:17a-22: sngags sngon du 'gro bas de nas bstod pa ni /
T02TD2593E:17a-25: de nas dgug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par bya ba ni /
T02TD2593E:17a-26: sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drangs pa la sogs pa ste sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2593E:17a-27: de nas gtso bo'i sngags rings la //
T02TD2593E:17a-28: dri shya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing //
T02TD2593E:17a-29: a'a ham zhes dang ldan par ni //
T02TD2593E:17a-30: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog bsgrub //
T02TD2593E:17a-32: lha thams cad ni phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ste /
T02TD2593E:17a-33: de yang phyag rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02TD2593E:17a-34: las mchog gi skabs bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:17a-35: de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2593E:17a-36: mchod nas zhes bya bas mchod pa dbul ba ston te /
T02TD2593E:17a-37: de yang mchod pa dbul ba ni //
T02TD2593E:17a-38: thun mong gi mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2593E:17a-39: phyi nang gi lha mo brgyang kyi mchod pa dang /
T02TD2593E:17a-41: mchod pa gzhan yang ci 'byor tshad du dbul lo //
T02TD2593E:17a-43: dang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i ;
T02TD2593E:17a-44: / gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2593E:17a-45: zhes bya bas phyag btsal bar ston te /
T02TD2593E:17a-46: de yang phyag bzhi btsal ba ni //
T02TD2593E:17a-47: shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang /
T02TD2593E:17a-48: lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang /
T02TD2593E:17b-0: nub phyogs kyi sgo nas padma'i rigs kyi phyag btsal @17b ba dang /
T02TD2593E:17b-1: byang phyogs kyi sgo nas las kyi rigs kyi phyag btsal ba ste /
T02TD2593E:17b-2: lus kyi bca' thabs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang phyogs dang lngas shes par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:17b-4: de'i 'og tu bla ma'i gdams ngag gis mnyam pa gsum dang bsnyen pa ni bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2593E:17b-5: mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab gdon pa dang sngags bzlas ba rnams ston pa ni /
T02TD2593E:17b-6: de yang mnyam pa rnam pa gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la /
T02TD2593E:17b-9: zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang bdag sku gsung thugs rdo rje mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsam /
T02TD2593E:17b-10: aom sva bh'a wa bi shuddho& ham /
T02TD2593E:17b-12: lha thams cad dang bdag rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom /
T02TD2593E:17b-13: aom sarba sa mo& ham zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2593E:17b-14: lha thams cad dang bdag med par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom mo //
T02TD2593E:17b-15: de ltar mnyam pa nyid gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la /
T02TD2593E:17b-16: lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2593E:17b-17: mtshan dang sngags kyi bzlas pa byed na yang /
T02TD2593E:17b-18: lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la /
T02TD2593E:17b-19: bdag gis mtshan dang sngags kyi bzlas pa byas pa'i dus su lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang bzlas pa'i sgra 'byung bar bsam /
T02TD2593E:17b-20: de ltar byas nas bsnyen pa lngar 'gyur te /
T02TD2593E:17b-21: bsgom pa'i bsnyen pa la dus kyi bsnyen pa dang /
T02TD2593E:17b-22: mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa gnyis so //
T02TD2593E:17b-26: grangs kyi bsnyen pa dang gsum mo //
T02TD2593E:17b-27: de ltar bsnyen pa rnam pa lnga'o //
T02TD2593E:17b-28: de la sngags rnams 'di yin te /
T02TD2593E:17b-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i shva ra h'um /
T02TD2593E:17b-43: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um /
T02TD2593E:18a-5: aom badzra karma kam / aom badzra raksha ham /
T02TD2593E:18a-8: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:/
T02TD2593E:18a-11: aom badzra a'a be sha aa /
T02TD2593E:18a-12: khyad par gyi snying po'i sngags so //
T02TD2593E:18a-13: aom badzra pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye ya te na ma:/
T02TD2593E:18a-14: aom du:kha tstshe da ya te na ma:/
T02TD2593E:18a-15: aom badzra t'ikshna ya te na ma:/
T02TD2593E:18a-16: aom w'a g'i shva ra ya te na ma:/
T02TD2593E:18a-17: aom dzny'a na k'a ya ya te na ma:/
T02TD2593E:18a-18: aom aa ra pa tsa na ya te na ma:/
T02TD2593E:18a-20: go bzlog par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:18a-21: aom sarba dharm'a aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba ;
T02TD2593E:18a-24: bra kri ta pa ri shuddha /
T02TD2593E:18a-27: sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na k'a ya /
T02TD2593E:18a-28: manydzu shr'i ba ri shuddhi ta mu ba da ya ti /
T02TD2593E:18a-30: sarba ta th'a gati hra da ya /
T02TD2593E:18a-34: dzny'a na m'urti w'a g'i shva ra /
T02TD2593E:18a-37: aa ma la su ba ri shuddha dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha aa:/
T02TD2593E:18a-39: lha thams cad kyi spyi'i sku'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i sngags dang phreng sngags so //
T02TD2593E:18a-42: // / de nas sgrub ba la 'jug pa ni /
T02TD2593E:18a-43: de nas rang dga'i gnas nyid du //
T02TD2593E:18a-44: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD2593E:18a-46: bsgrub ba'i gnas dang bsgrub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba spyir mdor ba stan te /
T02TD2593E:18a-47: de yang gnas ni nyams dga' zhing yid 'jug pa /
T02TD2593E:18a-48: rgyal po dang theg pa dman pa la sogs pas dben par bya bar gsungs so //
T02TD2593E:18a-49: sa de gzhung bzhin spyang bya dang //
T02TD2593E:18a-50: gzung dang ldan pa gzhung bzhin du //
T02TD2593E:18a-51: bya ba'i bye brag gzhan na'o //
T02TD2593E:18a-53: sa'i cho ga rgyas par bya bar ston te /
T02TD2593E:18a-54: de yang bla mas gsang ba spyi dang rtsa rgyud chen po la sogs par sa'i cho ga spyi don brgyang kyis shes par bya ba ni /
T02TD2593E:18a-55: tshes gcig nas bco lnga'i bar du gza' skar bzang po la zhugs te /
T02TD2593E:18a-56: slob dpon slob ma'i spyod lam bya ba ni /
T02TD2593E:18a-57: za gcig gi smyung ba dang dkar gsum bza' ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam bya'o //
T02TD2593E:18a-60: lha khang la sogs pa'i shar ram byang phyogs su bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2593E:18b-0: de nas ji tsam byed pa'i dkyil 'khor @18b gyi sa bcad la sa'i lto 'phye brtag par byas la /
T02TD2593E:18b-1: lto ba nas sa brkos te sa'i ro lnga spangs pa dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:18b-4: mi'i ro rus pa dang skra shad kyi dum bu dang /
T02TD2593E:18b-6: shing gi ro mgal du ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2593E:18b-7: rtsva'i ro phub ma la sogs pa med par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:18b-8: rgyal pos ni dkyil 'khor khru brgya lnga bcu pa la bya'o //
T02TD2593E:18b-9: blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu pa la'am de'i phyed la bya'o //
T02TD2593E:18b-10: sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug la bya'o //
T02TD2593E:18b-11: sa brtag pa ni nyis 'gyur tshun du brtag go //
T02TD2593E:18b-12: de nas yul gyi rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa la bslang ba'o //
T02TD2593E:18b-13: sa'i lha mo la bslang ba dang /
T02TD2593E:18b-14: dkon mchog gsum la bslang ba dang /
T02TD2593E:18b-15: sa bdag la sogs pa la bslang ba'o //
T02TD2593E:18b-16: de nas yid kyis sa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2593E:18b-17: lag na gser gyi bum pa thogs pa cig / sa'i 'og nas sku phyed tsam 'thon par bsams la /
T02TD2593E:18b-18: spos chus brlan par byas pa'i lag pas sa la lan gsum brdabs la /
T02TD2593E:18b-19: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2593E:18b-20: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
T02TD2593E:18b-21: sa dang pa rol phyin pa la //
T02TD2593E:18b-22: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02TD2593E:18b-23: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD2593E:18b-24: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar //
T02TD2593E:18b-25: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02TD2593E:18b-26: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2593E:18b-28: sa'i lha mo'i zhal nas khyod ci bde bar bris shig zer nas sa'i nang du thim par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:18b-29: yang na dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mandala khru gang gru bzhi pa cig byas la /
T02TD2593E:18b-30: der mchod pa rnams pa lnga dang gtor ma cha gcig bshams la /
T02TD2593E:18b-31: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul te /
T02TD2593E:18b-32: spos kyi snod thogs te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02TD2593E:18b-33: dgongs shig bdag la sangs rgyas dgongs //
T02TD2593E:18b-34: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang //
T02TD2593E:18b-35: sems can rnams la sman slad du //
T02TD2593E:18b-36: rnam par snang mdzad chen po yi //
T02TD2593E:18b-38: rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis //
T02TD2593E:18b-39: bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02TD2593E:18b-40: de skad ces lan gsum brjod pas /
T02TD2593E:18b-41: dkon mchog gsum gyis ngang ba byin par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:19a-0: yang gtor ma aa k'a ro la sogs pas @19a * //
T02TD2593E:19a-2: dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2593E:19a-3: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te spos thogs te /
T02TD2593E:19a-4: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i lha klu dang //
T02TD2593E:19a-5: gnod spyin dri za lha ma yin //
T02TD2593E:19a-6: yang dag rdzu 'phrul cher ldan pa'i //
T02TD2593E:19a-8: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2593E:19a-9: sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang //
T02TD2593E:19a-10: sems can rnams la phan don du //
T02TD2593E:19a-12: ji ltar bsams pa bzhin 'bri na //
T02TD2593E:19a-13: khyed kyis bar chad ma byed par //
T02TD2593E:19a-14: dge ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod //
T02TD2593E:19a-15: da ltar bdag gis khyod la ni //
T02TD2593E:19a-16: bzod bar gsol gyis mi slu bar //
T02TD2593E:19a-17: rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yi //
T02TD2593E:19a-18: legs nyes ltas rnams ba stan du gsol //
T02TD2593E:19a-19: lan gsum gsol ba btab pas /
T02TD2593E:19a-20: sa bdag la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyis shig pa'i ngang ba byin par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:19a-21: de nas chag chag dang skyang nul legs par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:19a-22: rdo rje gnod spyin gyi sngags kyis /
T02TD2593E:19a-23: yungs kar gtor zhing bgegs bskrad nas /
T02TD2593E:19a-25: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba lan gsum mam /
T02TD2593E:19a-26: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:19a-27: de nas zhi ba'i spyin sreg gis bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o //
T02TD2593E:19a-28: yang na dang por sa'i pra brtag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2593E:19a-30: rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyi pus mo nub tsam mam lte ba nub tsam bkros la /
T02TD2593E:19a-31: de yang gong gi sa'i lha mo nam mkha' la aom badzra au pa ta ya zhes brjod la gdeg / de nas dong gi nang du chus bkang ste /
T02TD2593E:19a-35: zlos shing shar phyogs su gom pa mi drag mi dal ba brgya phyin te /
T02TD2593E:19a-36: tshur log nas chu de ma skams na dngos grub yod par ston /
T02TD2593E:19a-37: chu skams na gzhan du spo bar bshad /
T02TD2593E:19a-38: de nas rdza so ma btang ba zhig tu rin po che sna lnga dang 'bru lnga dang sman dang snying po dang spos dang lnga blugs la /
T02TD2593E:19a-39: dong gi nang du gzhug go //
T02TD2593E:19a-40: de nas brkos pa'i sa de rdo rje gnod spyin gyi sngags btab pa'i spos chus bral brul du sprus la nang dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD2593E:19b-0: lhag par gyur na dngos grub mchog yod @19b par ba stan /
T02TD2593E:19b-2: de nas rdo rje gnod spyin bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag gdab /
T02TD2593E:19b-3: 'thas par bcags la me long gi rgyab bzhin du byas pa ni sa las dang bya bas spyang ba'o //
T02TD2593E:19b-4: rdo rje gnod spyin nam rdo rje rtse mo bzlas pa'i spos chus bsang gtor bya ba dang /
T02TD2593E:19b-5: zhi ba'i spyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang /
T02TD2593E:19b-6: yungs kar gyis gtor ba ni sngags kyis spyang ba'o //
T02TD2593E:19b-7: ting nge 'dzin gyis spyang ba ni /
T02TD2593E:19b-8: slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la /
T02TD2593E:19b-9: rdo rje chen po nas gzhal yas khang la thug ba'i bar du bsgoms la sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa'i nang du sa chud par bsgom par bya'o ;
T02TD2593E:19b-11: de nas slob dpon lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02TD2593E:19b-12: sa phyogs 'di nyid du bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya'o zhes bsam pa sngon du btang ba ni /
T02TD2593E:19b-13: sems kyi dbang gis sa bzung ba'o //
T02TD2593E:19b-14: de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas /
T02TD2593E:19b-15: ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02TD2593E:19b-22: zhes zlos shing 'dug pa yan chad ni /
T02TD2593E:19b-23: slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin no //
T02TD2593E:19b-24: de nas bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog rigs bzhi'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa bzhis /
T02TD2593E:19b-25: shar phyogs kyi sgo nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de /
T02TD2593E:19b-26: mtshan brgya rtse brgyang 'di dag gis //
T02TD2593E:19b-27: bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis //
T02TD2593E:19b-28: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzad //
T02TD2593E:19b-29: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2593E:19b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che //
T02TD2593E:19b-31: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2593E:19b-33: bgegs tshar gcad par gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02TD2593E:19b-34: de la mig byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02TD2593E:19b-35: g-yas su ma las nyi ma g-yon du ta las zla ba /
T02TD2593E:19b-36: de gnyis kyi steng du h'um gis mig 'bras tshul du byas pa ni mig byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD2593E:19b-37: rkang mthil gnyis su aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom pa na rkang pa brlab pa'o //
T02TD2593E:19b-38: bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD2593E:19b-39: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02TD2593E:19b-40: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02TD2593E:19b-41: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid //
T02TD2593E:20a-0: bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag / byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor @20a * //
T02TD2593E:20a-2: / rdo rje lta bas tshar bcad pa'i mig g-yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor g-yon phyogs su bskor bas /
T02TD2593E:20a-3: bgegs thams cad gsal btab par bsam /
T02TD2593E:20a-4: g-yas kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis g-yas phyogs su bskor bas bgegs thams cad bsreg par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:20a-5: de ni rdo rje lta bas tshar gcod do //
T02TD2593E:20a-6: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas byang shar mtshams su byis pa gzhon du bzhin du mchongs te phyin la /
T02TD2593E:20a-7: kha lho phyogs su bltas la /
T02TD2593E:20a-9: rdo rje lan gsum gsor zhing /
T02TD2593E:20a-11: rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas /
T02TD2593E:20a-12: slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba /
T02TD2593E:20a-13: rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2593E:20a-14: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2593E:20a-15: sa phyogs 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ngas 'bri yis ;
T02TD2593E:20a-29: rgan mo g-yog dang 'khor du bcas pa /
T02TD2593E:20a-30: gang dag 'khod pa de dag dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas //
T02TD2593E:20a-31: myur ba nyid du dengs shig / gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rje mgo tshal ba brgyar dvags par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2593E:20a-32: de nas rkang pa'i sor mos rdo rje rtse gcig pas la 'bri zhing /
T02TD2593E:20a-33: h'um h'um zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor bskor ba ni rdo rje 'gros kyis tshar gcad pa'o //
T02TD2593E:20a-34: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir rkang stabs bdun dang /
T02TD2593E:20a-35: lag stabs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bya ba ni /
T02TD2593E:20a-36: rdo rje stangs stabs kyis thams cad thal kar gcig pu'am /
T02TD2593E:20a-37: yang na de bas mang yang rung //
T02TD2593E:20a-38: shar gyi phyogs su gzugs par bya //
T02TD2593E:20a-39: phog phor kham pa las byas pa //
T02TD2593E:20a-40: so ma btang ba dkar po bcu //
T02TD2593E:20a-41: byas nas phyogs dang mtshams su ni //
T02TD2593E:20a-42: brgyang pa de bzhin ba dun du dgod //
T02TD2593E:20a-43: pog phor dag tu ma 'byor na //
T02TD2593E:20a-44: kham pa'i phor bu'i nang nas dbul //
T02TD2593E:20a-45: de dag kyang ni ma 'byor na //
T02TD2593E:20b-0: gcig @20b cig sgor ni gzhag nas dbul //
T02TD2593E:20b-1: me tog phreng bas brgyan pa yi //
T02TD2593E:20b-2: rta babs dag kyang phyogs bzhir bya //
T02TD2593E:20b-3: nas dang gro dang 'bru rnams kyi //
T02TD2593E:20b-4: myu gu legs par skye bar dgod //
T02TD2593E:20b-5: dril bu gdugs dang rnga yab dang //
T02TD2593E:20b-6: srad bu dag kyang phyogs bzhir ni //
T02TD2593E:20b-7: rta babs sogs las phyi rol du //
T02TD2593E:20b-8: mdzes par bya phyir mkhas bas gdags //
T02TD2593E:20b-10: me tog sil ma rab tu dgram //
T02TD2593E:20b-11: dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol du //
T02TD2593E:20b-12: phyi ma'i ri mo sdu gu bri //
T02TD2593E:20b-14: bkra shis la sogs gang yin rnams //
T02TD2593E:20b-15: dkyil 'khor bdag gi phyi rol du ;
T02TD2593E:20b-16: / phyogs bzhi dag tu mkhas pas dgod //
T02TD2593E:20b-17: yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa'i chus dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas phyi dang nang du bcas pa bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD2593E:20b-18: de nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2593E:20b-19: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kha'i dbus su bzhag la /
T02TD2593E:20b-22: de nas phyi dro'i dus su /
T02TD2593E:20b-23: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams dang /
T02TD2593E:20b-25: spos la sogs pa rnams kyis dang po'i 'khor lo ji snyed ba dang /
T02TD2593E:20b-26: ci 'dod pa de bzhin du mchod cing brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:20b-27: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig sems dpa'i sku gzugs lugs ma la sogs pa dkar po sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la /
T02TD2593E:20b-28: rang gi snying pos bzhugs su gsol te /
T02TD2593E:20b-30: yang na sangs rgyas kyi snying po aom h'um hris bzhugs su gsol la /
T02TD2593E:20b-31: de bzhin du lha gzhan gyi yang sku bzhugs pa'am /
T02TD2593E:20b-33: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po 'bru gsum brjod cing 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la dkyil 'khor bslang la /
T02TD2593E:20b-34: de nas ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum sngon bzhin bsgoms la /
T02TD2593E:20b-35: de nas nam mkha'i lha bsre bar bya ste /
T02TD2593E:20b-36: yi ge phyin ci ma log pas kha spyar gyi sbyor ba bsal lo ;
T02TD2593E:20b-37: / bar snang la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bkug pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bkug la bcug ste /
T02TD2593E:20b-38: bcings nas dbang du byas te /
T02TD2593E:20b-39: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa byas la /
T02TD2593E:20b-40: byin gyis rlob cing mnyes par byas nas gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:21a-1: pa rgya chen po mdo klog pa yan chod byas la /
T02TD2593E:21a-2: spyi'am so so'i sngags kyi bsnyen pa byas la phyis 'byung ba bzhin du slob dpon rang nyid bzhugs shing dbang lha las blang ngo //
T02TD2593E:21a-3: de nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur bar bya bar ba stan pa'i phyir dkyus ma nyid 'khrugs sdeb ste /
T02TD2593E:21a-5: de nas 'dir dbang dam par gsungs //
T02TD2593E:21a-6: dbang bskur med na 'grub ba med //
T02TD2593E:21a-7: yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis //
T02TD2593E:21a-9: ces bya bas dbang nod pa'i yon tan ston te /
T02TD2593E:21a-10: dbang bskur zhing dam tshig dang ldan na /
T02TD2593E:21a-11: dngos grub rnam pa gnyis 'thob par lung gis ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2593E:21a-12: dang por khrus byas gos gyon te //
T02TD2593E:21a-13: rgyal po'i cha lugs 'dra ba dang //
T02TD2593E:21a-14: bud med lta bu'i tshul ldan pas //
T02TD2593E:21a-15: slob dpon bla mar gyur pa la //
T02TD2593E:21a-16: dbang rnams nod par rab tu gsungs //
T02TD2593E:21a-18: dbang nod pa'i phyir dbang gi sngon du spyod lam de'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ston te /
T02TD2593E:21a-20: bsgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams byas la /
T02TD2593E:21a-21: phyir 'byung la slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:21a-22: slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob ma las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la /
T02TD2593E:21a-23: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa la /
T02TD2593E:21a-24: rdo rje gnod spyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2593E:21a-28: gos dmar po las byas pa'i gtsug tor dang /
T02TD2593E:21a-29: sgo srung bzhi'i snying po yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar pos gdong bcings la /
T02TD2593E:21a-30: yon gyi dam pa dag phul ba yongs su bzung ste nge'i snying ga dang dpral ba dang /
T02TD2593E:21a-32: spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang /
T02TD2593E:21a-35: sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba'i steng du de'i sa bon gyi rnam par dgod pa /
T02TD2593E:21a-36: phyogs bzhi nas sngon bzhin phyag 'tshal du bcug la /
T02TD2593E:21a-37: des kyang de bzhin du rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2593E:21a-38: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed du nus par byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:21a-39: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhag la /
T02TD2593E:21a-40: de bzhin du sdom pa spyin no //
T02TD2593E:21a-41: aom bo dhi tsi tto tb'a da y'a mi /
T02TD2593E:21b-0: @21b byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2593E:21b-1: dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su //
T02TD2593E:21b-2: snying pos rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02TD2593E:21b-3: de nas su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho /
T02TD2593E:21b-4: siddhya badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2593E:21b-6: de nas sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2593E:21b-7: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching du gzhug cing /
T02TD2593E:21b-8: de bzhin du phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD2593E:21b-9: de nas sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2593E:21b-10: zhes brjod la slob ma nang du gzhug go //
T02TD2593E:21b-11: de nas 'di skad ces kyang bsgo'o //
T02TD2593E:21b-12: deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02TD2593E:21b-13: ngas khyod la ya shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'ang thob na /
T02TD2593E:21b-14: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2593E:21b-15: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis /
T02TD2593E:21b-16: khyod kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra zhig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta te /
T02TD2593E:21b-17: de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya kha thur du ba stan la /
T02TD2593E:21b-18: rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:21b-19: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin gyis //
T02TD2593E:21b-20: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:21b-21: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2593E:21b-22: mna'i chu'i snying pos lan cig bsngags la /
T02TD2593E:21b-24: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2593E:21b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2593E:21b-26: snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad kyis //
T02TD2593E:21b-27: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2593E:21b-28: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2593E:21b-30: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2593E:21b-31: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2593E:21b-32: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02TD2593E:21b-34: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2593E:21b-35: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smros //
T02TD2593E:21b-37: dad pa med par bgad par 'gyur //
T02TD2593E:21b-38: de nas slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo shig / deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ni nga yin gyis /
T02TD2593E:21b-39: ngas 'di gyis zhes bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so //
T02TD2593E:21b-40: khyod nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
T02TD2593E:21b-41: dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2593E:22a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la @22a * //
T02TD2593E:22a-1: 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo'i /
T02TD2593E:22a-2: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2593E:22a-3: 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2593E:22a-4: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste /
T02TD2593E:22a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' byin par grags //
T02TD2593E:22a-6: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02TD2593E:22a-7: de ring nyid du dbab par shog / aom badzra a'a be sha aa /
T02TD2593E:22a-9: de nas phyag rgya bcings pa las byung nas /
T02TD2593E:22a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' babs par gyur par bsams na /
T02TD2593E:22a-13: yang na ho aa ho zhes bya ba rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la bkod de /
T02TD2593E:22a-14: se'u'i me tog dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi snying po las nges par phyung la /
T02TD2593E:22a-15: badzra bandha trat ces bya bas de'i snying kha phye la /
T02TD2593E:22a-17: rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2593E:22a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las gyur par bsams na yang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:22a-20: khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la rdo rje sems dpa' phyin yang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:22a-21: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje tshig lan bdun nam brgyang brjod pas kyang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:22a-22: slob ma'i gtso bo'i snying gar rdo rje bya //
T02TD2593E:22a-23: yi ge brgya pas brtan por byas nas ni //
T02TD2593E:22a-24: bdag lus kyis yin snod kyi sgo dbye zhing //
T02TD2593E:22a-25: snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje dbus su blta //
T02TD2593E:22a-26: sngags kyi bdag po yi ge aa dmar gzugs //
T02TD2593E:22a-27: brjod pas yang dag chags par g-yo bar blta //
T02TD2593E:22a-29: de nas aom par ma su kh'a sha ya su la li ta /
T02TD2593E:22a-31: na ma mi bha ga b'an ta dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2593E:22a-33: pra ti tstsha badzra ku su ma /
T02TD2593E:22a-35: zhes brjod pa'i sngags 'dis phreng ba de dkyil 'khor du dor ro //
T02TD2593E:22a-36: de nas dngos grub ba rab 'bri nag me tog babs pa las brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:22a-37: lha rnams kyi khyad par dang /
T02TD2593E:22a-38: gnas kyi khyad par las brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:22a-39: gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi //
T02TD2593E:22a-40: dbu la me tog babs gyur na //
T02TD2593E:22a-41: de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag /'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02TD2593E:22a-43: stod du bab na mchog rnams 'grub //
T02TD2593E:22a-44: rked du bab na 'bri nag rnams 'grub //
T02TD2593E:22a-45: ro smad phyogs su bab na ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-1: bar gyi sku la bab na ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-3: smad du bab par gyur na ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-5: rim pa de dag thams cad ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-6: rigs bzhi rnams las shes par bya //
T02TD2593E:22b-7: de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang //
T02TD2593E:22b-8: dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02TD2593E:22b-9: gal te lha yi gzugs dag las //
T02TD2593E:22b-10: me tog ring du lhung gyur na //
T02TD2593E:22b-11: de ni dngos grub yun ring 'gyur //
T02TD2593E:22b-12: nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02TD2593E:22b-13: gsang sngags rnams kyi mchod pa dag / gang du 'gram pa tshun chod ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-14: de yi sa yis de yin te //
T02TD2593E:22b-15: me tog de lhung de yi rigs //
T02TD2593E:22b-16: lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag tu //
T02TD2593E:22b-17: gal te me tog bab gyur na //
T02TD2593E:22b-18: gang du nye bar gyur pa ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-19: de ni de yi rigs su bshad //
T02TD2593E:22b-20: gal te la la'i me tog ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-22: de la dngos grub phal 'grub cing //
T02TD2593E:22b-23: de ni dad pa'ang rab tu chung //
T02TD2593E:22b-24: gal te me tog bor ba dag / ra ba'i ri bo la bab na //
T02TD2593E:22b-25: zhi ba'i bya bas de nas sdod //
T02TD2593E:22b-26: nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug / de ste the tshom gyur na ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-27: mkhas pas bzlas te 'dor mi gzhug / de ni gang yang nges med pas //
T02TD2593E:22b-29: gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang //
T02TD2593E:22b-30: don med phyi rol ltung na ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-31: zhi ba'i spyin sreg byas nas su //
T02TD2593E:22b-32: de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug / snying por me tog bab na ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-33: rtag tu don med mi 'gyur bshad //
T02TD2593E:22b-34: srad bu dag gi cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2593E:22b-35: de yi nye 'khor shes par bya //
T02TD2593E:22b-36: de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yi //
T02TD2593E:22b-37: me tog rnams ni bor ba las //
T02TD2593E:22b-38: bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ni //
T02TD2593E:22b-39: de la zhi ba brtsam par bya //
T02TD2593E:22b-40: spyin sreg gi sa ni zhi byas nas //
T02TD2593E:22b-41: de ni slar la 'dor du gzhug / lan gsum stsogs te bor na yang //
T02TD2593E:22b-42: gal te legs par ma babs na //
T02TD2593E:22b-43: re thag gcad de slar gtang ngo //
T02TD2593E:22b-44: de nas me tog bab pa las lha yang dag par shes par byas nas phreng ba blangs te /
T02TD2593E:22b-45: aom pra ti gri hn'a sva mi mam /
T02TD2593E:22b-46: sa tvam ma h'a ba la /
T02TD2593E:22b-49: ye shes babs pa'i mtshan ma las //
T02TD2593E:23a-0: nye bar mtshon nas de la mig gis @23a * //
T02TD2593E:23a-2: des ci ltar mthong ba de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:23a-3: gal te dkar po snang ba mthong na ni //
T02TD2593E:23a-4: de la dngos grub mchog bslab bo //
T02TD2593E:23a-5: gal te ser po mthong na de la don 'byung ba'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:23a-6: gal te dmar po mthong na de la rjes su chags pa'i ye shes bslab bo //
T02TD2593E:23a-7: 'on te nag por mthong ba de la mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab po //
T02TD2593E:23a-8: gal te sna tshogs par mthong na //
T02TD2593E:23a-9: de la dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bkrol nas bslab par bya'o zhes rgya cher spyar ro //
T02TD2593E:23a-10: de nas snying po 'dis gdong g-yogs bkrol te ;
T02TD2593E:23a-11: aom badzra sa tva ya yan te tya /
T02TD2593E:23a-12: tsakshu gha ta na pa rot gha ta ma ti /
T02TD2593E:23a-13: sarba ksho badzra tsakshu ma nutta ram /
T02TD2593E:23a-14: de nas he badzra pa'i shya /
T02TD2593E:23a-16: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol nas ni //
T02TD2593E:23a-17: dkyil 'khor bzang po ba stan par bya //
T02TD2593E:23a-18: de nas bla ma dgar gyur nas //
T02TD2593E:23a-19: slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo //
T02TD2593E:23a-21: da ni dad ba rab tu bskyed //
T02TD2593E:23a-22: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2593E:23a-23: sngags dang rig pas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2593E:23a-24: 'gro ba phun sum dngos grub kyang //
T02TD2593E:23a-25: thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur //
T02TD2593E:23a-26: dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs //
T02TD2593E:23a-27: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02TD2593E:23a-28: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ba stan par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:23a-29: mi mnyam med par zur bzhi snyoms //
T02TD2593E:23a-30: dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste //
T02TD2593E:23a-31: bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi //
T02TD2593E:23a-32: ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya //
T02TD2593E:23a-33: khyams las bden pa'i rdo rje dag / gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin //
T02TD2593E:23a-34: rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yang //
T02TD2593E:23a-35: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02TD2593E:23a-36: gdul byas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrog pa yin //
T02TD2593E:23a-37: me long ye shes rtag mi rtog / byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02TD2593E:23a-38: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / nyi ma zla ba yang dag ldan //
T02TD2593E:23a-39: kun 'grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02TD2593E:23a-40: bde ba chen po zhes grags pa'o //
T02TD2593E:23a-41: de ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD2593E:23a-42: ka ba dkyil 'khor brgyang pa yi //
T02TD2593E:23a-43: dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i //
T02TD2593E:23a-44: rnam thar brgyang po de nyid yin //
T02TD2593E:23a-45: theg pa chen po byang chub sems //
T02TD2593E:23b-0: mdo sde 'khor lo bskor @23b ngas na //
T02TD2593E:23b-1: rdo rje thig gis yongs gdab cing //
T02TD2593E:23b-2: thams cad du yang yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD2593E:23b-3: gang dag 'jug pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2593E:23b-4: mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog dang //
T02TD2593E:23b-5: bde ba chen po rab 'grub phyir //
T02TD2593E:23b-6: de dag dag par yang dag 'gyur //
T02TD2593E:23b-7: de nas phyag rgya dang snying po yang bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:23b-8: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2593E:23b-9: mgon po rnam snang gi bar du ba stan par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:23b-10: dang po sdig pa bsreg byas nas //
T02TD2593E:23b-11: de la dbab dang dral ba bya //
T02TD2593E:23b-12: de dag kun gyi rim pa yang //
T02TD2593E:23b-13: rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar //
T02TD2593E:23b-14: 'dir ni de dag bya ba yin //
T02TD2593E:23b-16: dbang bskur ba'i slob ma rgyud dag par bya ba'i phyir sdig pa bsreg pa ni /
T02TD2593E:23b-17: til gyi sreg blugs sdig pa bsreg pa'i sngags dang bcas pa brgya rtsa brgyang kyis zhi ba'i spyin sreg byas la /
T02TD2593E:23b-18: de nas thal mo dam du bsdams la /
T02TD2593E:23b-19: sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni //
T02TD2593E:23b-20: rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te //
T02TD2593E:23b-21: rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams //
T02TD2593E:23b-22: badzra aanydza li zhes rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so //
T02TD2593E:23b-23: badzra bandha zhes brjod cing slob ma'i snying gar lan gsum dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2593E:23b-24: de nas ye shes dbab pa ni //
T02TD2593E:23b-25: badzra a'a be sha aa zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa la /
T02TD2593E:23b-26: aa aa zhes pa aa brgyas slob ma la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:23b-27: mchod pa'i lan dang spyin pa dang //
T02TD2593E:23b-29: slob mas slob dpon la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2593E:23b-30: spyin ba dang zhes bya bas dbang bskur ba'i sngon yon bzhin du slob dpon la dbul bar ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2593E:23b-31: rim pa dang ldan pas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2593E:23b-32: de nas de la chu dbang bskur //
T02TD2593E:23b-33: gzhan yang phyag rgya'i dbang dang ni //
T02TD2593E:23b-34: cod pan dar dpyangs rdo rje dang //
T02TD2593E:23b-35: bdag po ming la sogs pa dang //
T02TD2593E:23b-38: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang dang drug bskur bar ba stan pa ni /
T02TD2593E:23b-39: gang du me tog bab par gyur pa de'i rigs dang gzugs su bskyed la /
T02TD2593E:23b-40: de'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2593E:23b-41: snying po 'di dang rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2593E:23b-43: de nas de dang rjes su mthun pa'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2593E:23b-44: dang dpyangs kyis dbang bskur la /
T02TD2593E:24a-1: ma'i dbang bskur ba lag tu byin te /
T02TD2593E:24a-2: mtshan ma dang rjes su mthun par sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:24a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2593E:24a-4: di ring khyod la bskur bar 'gyur //
T02TD2593E:24a-5: sangs rgyas kun du [*kun tu?] dbang bskur phyir //
T02TD2593E:24a-6: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2593E:24a-7: rang gi mtshan mas bdag po'i dbang gi snying po 'dis spyin par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:24a-8: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02TD2593E:24a-10: tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2593E:24a-11: de nas snying po 'dis dril bu spyin par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:24a-12: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02TD2593E:24a-13: a'adya nu tpa nna / aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02TD2593E:24a-14: a'adya nu tpa nna tv'a badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi ;
T02TD2593E:24a-15: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD2593E:24a-16: kye rdo rje zhes gang gis ming gang brjod pa der skye zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:24a-17: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2593E:24a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02TD2593E:24a-19: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
T02TD2593E:24a-20: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2593E:24a-21: zhes bya bas lag tu rdo rje byin la /
T02TD2593E:24a-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya /
T02TD2593E:24a-23: tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02TD2593E:24a-25: de nas phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du bzhag la /
T02TD2593E:24a-26: spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la sngags kyis bskul ba'i tshig brgya rtsa brgyang bzlas pa'i sngags byin la /
T02TD2593E:24a-27: phyag rgya bzhi'i yi shes bzlas par bya ba ni /
T02TD2593E:24a-29: slob mas kyang rdo rje thal mo bskor ba byas la phyag bya ste /
T02TD2593E:24a-30: phreng ba bcing ba la sogs thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2593E:24a-31: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2593E:24a-32: dbang rnams rdzogs nas dbang byin pa //
T02TD2593E:24a-33: gsang ba'i dbang dang nges pa'i dbang //
T02TD2593E:24a-34: rim pa bzhin du rab tu bskur //
T02TD2593E:24a-35: de nas bkra shis brjod bya zhing //
T02TD2593E:24a-37: rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba ston te /
T02TD2593E:24a-38: de yang de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon bzang po phul la /
T02TD2593E:24a-39: gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:24a-40: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la ;
T02TD2593E:24a-41: / ji ltar mchog chen stsol mdzad pa //
T02TD2593E:24a-42: bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD2593E:24a-43: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD2593E:24a-44: slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid du gyur pas /
T02TD2593E:24a-45: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs padma bris la /
T02TD2593E:24b-0: slob ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i skur zla ba'i @24b dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la /
T02TD2593E:24b-1: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2593E:24b-3: yang na dkyil 'khor las khru gsum tsam yongs su dor bar dbang bskur ba'i sgo la mngon par phyogs par byas la /
T02TD2593E:24b-4: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad tsam la /
T02TD2593E:24b-6: sgo nub phyogs su bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon snang lngas bris la /
T02TD2593E:24b-7: de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyang pa bris /
T02TD2593E:24b-8: de'i steng du seng ge'i gdan zla ba'i steng du dkyil 'khor ras kyis bkab pa dang seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du bla re bre zhing g-yas logs su dar dang /
T02TD2593E:24b-9: me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs rtse mo dkar ba dang /
T02TD2593E:24b-10: dmar ba la gtsug tor gdugs dkar pos yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2593E:24b-12: ras sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2593E:24b-13: ba dan aom yongs su bzlas pa legs par bzhag la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2593E:24b-14: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing /
T02TD2593E:24b-17: dung la sogs pa'i rol mo phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2593E:24b-18: phyi'i gar dang glu la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2593E:24b-19: sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod cing /
T02TD2593E:24b-20: bkra shis kyi glu len cing /
T02TD2593E:24b-21: dril bu dkrol bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i chu rnams kyis /
T02TD2593E:24b-22: de'i sngags gdon pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid dang /
T02TD2593E:24b-23: rdo rje slob dpon chen po nyid du dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2593E:24b-26: ji srid par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i bar dang dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2593E:24b-27: de nas de'i mgor yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sku gzugs de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzung la /
T02TD2593E:24b-28: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva dza: dza:h'um bam ho:su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2593E:24b-29: zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas la /
T02TD2593E:24b-30: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:24b-31: shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i //
T02TD2593E:24b-32: byang chub sems kyis 'jam dbyangs byang chub bde dbang bskur //
T02TD2593E:24b-33: rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis legs gsung bkra shis gang //
T02TD2593E:24b-34: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams //
T02TD2593E:24b-35: yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom //
T02TD2593E:24b-36: phyi rol dri sogs dam tshig gis //
T02TD2593E:24b-37: sprin ltar brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom //
T02TD2593E:25a-1: na rdo rje dbyings kyi ni //
T02TD2593E:25a-2: ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje bsgom //
T02TD2593E:25a-3: dam tshig mchog gi bum pa yang //
T02TD2593E:25a-4: 'dzin par mkhas pas bsgom par bya //
T02TD2593E:25a-5: rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2593E:25a-6: de tshe de la dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2593E:25a-7: rdzogs sangs rdo rje lha mo rnams //
T02TD2593E:25a-8: rang nyid gsol bar mdzad par 'gyur ;
T02TD2593E:25a-9: / de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2593E:25a-11: ma h'a su kha badzra satva aa bhi she ka na h'um /
T02TD2593E:25a-13: sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2593E:25a-14: siddha na ma ste bha ga b'a na /
T02TD2593E:25a-15: ma h'a badzra dha ra su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2593E:25a-16: ma h'a badzra sa tva aom bhur bhu wa sv'a h'a /
T02TD2593E:25a-17: zhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la /
T02TD2593E:25a-18: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:25a-19: me tog ma'i gzugs kyi me tog gis gtor la /
T02TD2593E:25a-20: deng tshun chad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhed bas mchod na khyed mchod pa'i yan lag rdzogs shing /
T02TD2593E:25a-21: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang /
T02TD2593E:25a-22: dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan par byas pa'i skur mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
T02TD2593E:25a-23: de nas bdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2593E:25a-24: gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyed la bdug par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:25a-25: de nas mar me ma'i gzugs su mar me nye bar ba stan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:25a-26: deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan la yang dag par 'bar bas ;
T02TD2593E:25a-27: ma rig pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas snang ba byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:25a-28: de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyis byug pas byugs la /
T02TD2593E:25a-29: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:25a-30: deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2593E:25a-31: 'jig rten thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang /
T02TD2593E:25a-33: shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rgyun ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2593E:25a-34: de nas ho zhes bya bas gzhu byin nas /
T02TD2593E:25a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de /
T02TD2593E:25b-0: phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phen du gzhug cing steng dang 'og tu @25b yang re re 'phen du gzhug go //
T02TD2593E:25b-1: de nas sha dha bha nydza ga byin la /
T02TD2593E:25b-3: nye bar spyod pa thams cad sprul pa nye bar longs spyod cing /
T02TD2593E:25b-4: gzhan dag la yang byin cig / de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag cing /
T02TD2593E:25b-5: dung yang lag pa g-yas par byin te /
T02TD2593E:25b-7: smra ba gnyis kyi chos kyi yi ge dang lhan cig byin la /
T02TD2593E:25b-8: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:25b-9: deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig /'di ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02TD2593E:25b-10: skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2593E:25b-11: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02TD2593E:25b-12: kun du [*kun tu?] ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02TD2593E:25b-13: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2593E:25b-14: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD2593E:25b-15: gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02TD2593E:25b-16: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2593E:25b-17: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2593E:25b-18: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang //
T02TD2593E:25b-19: kun du [*kun tu?] khyod la srung bar byed //
T02TD2593E:25b-21: 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2593E:25b-22: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02TD2593E:25b-24: rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02TD2593E:25b-26: rgyal bar gyur cig / rgyal bar gyur cig /
T02TD2593E:25b-27: rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2593E:25b-28: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2593E:25b-29: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2593E:25b-30: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2593E:25b-31: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2593E:25b-33: rgyal bar gyur cig / rgyal bar gyur cig / rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po'i rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2593E:25b-35: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2593E:25b-36: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2593E:25b-37: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2593E:25b-41: rgyal bar gyur cig / padma'i rigs kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2593E:25b-43: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2593E:25b-44: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2593E:25b-45: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2593E:25b-46: las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2593E:26a-1: gyur cig / rgyal bar gyur cig / las kyi rigs kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2593E:26a-3: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2593E:26a-4: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2593E:26a-5: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2593E:26a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ;
T02TD2593E:26a-8: rgyal bar gyur cig / rgyal bar gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:26a-9: de nas slob mas rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la /
T02TD2593E:26a-11: gzengs bstod pas ni dngos po kun ;
T02TD2593E:26a-12: / sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de //
T02TD2593E:26a-13: rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang //
T02TD2593E:26a-14: de bzhin gshegs par lung ba stan to //
T02TD2593E:26a-16: nga yis 'di ltar khyod lung ba stan //
T02TD2593E:26a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2593E:26a-18: dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2593E:26a-19: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02TD2593E:26a-20: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
T02TD2593E:26a-21: siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu wa sva:/
T02TD2593E:26a-22: gzengs bstod pa ni 'di yin te //
T02TD2593E:26a-23: g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhag la /
T02TD2593E:26a-24: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa spyin te /
T02TD2593E:26a-25: 'dis phyag rgya chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas lung ba stan par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:26a-26: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2593E:26a-27: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rang gi dbang gi slob dpon dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de /
T02TD2593E:26a-29: 'di nyid kyang gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mchog tu gsang ba'i dngos grub mchog 'grub pa'i byin rlabs dang /
T02TD2593E:26a-30: gsang sngags 'di'i stobs la dad par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2593E:26a-31: mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2593E:26a-32: mthong ba dang ni zhugs pa yis //
T02TD2593E:26a-33: srid pa kun las rnam grol bar //
T02TD2593E:26a-34: khyod ni di ring gnas pa yin //
T02TD2593E:26a-35: bde chen theg pa 'di las ni //
T02TD2593E:26a-37: mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas //
T02TD2593E:26a-38: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD2593E:26a-39: dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2593E:26a-40: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das //
T02TD2593E:26b-0: srid pa shin tu grub @26b pa'i phyir //
T02TD2593E:26b-1: ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02TD2593E:26b-2: slob ma gus bas bla ma yi //
T02TD2593E:26b-3: rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas te //
T02TD2593E:26b-4: de nas ji skad gsungs pa kun //
T02TD2593E:26b-5: rjes su grub par khas blang ngo //
T02TD2593E:26b-6: de ltar dam bcas byas nas ni //
T02TD2593E:26b-7: cho ga 'di yis rang nyid kyis //
T02TD2593E:26b-8: rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni //
T02TD2593E:26b-9: blangs nas kyang ni de la spyin //
T02TD2593E:26b-10: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2593E:26b-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcing //
T02TD2593E:26b-12: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2593E:26b-13: de nas aom sarba th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra ya mi badzra satvam hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02TD2593E:26b-16: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2593E:26b-17: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba //
T02TD2593E:26b-18: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu ba cang //
T02TD2593E:26b-19: byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs //
T02TD2593E:26b-20: zhes brjod la dril bu spyin no //
T02TD2593E:26b-21: de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni //
T02TD2593E:26b-22: de nas sar pa'i gos rnams bskon //
T02TD2593E:26b-23: me tog dri la sogs pas mchod ;
T02TD2593E:26b-24: / mchod phyir gdu bu ba cang bar bya //
T02TD2593E:26b-25: de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2593E:26b-26: de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang gzugs //
T02TD2593E:26b-27: thal mo spyar ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2593E:26b-28: dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug / gdugs dang bcas pa sgo phyogs su //
T02TD2593E:26b-29: spyi bo btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug / slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
T02TD2593E:26b-31: mkhan pos de skad smras nas su //
T02TD2593E:26b-32: gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de //
T02TD2593E:26b-33: lag par legs par blangs nas su //
T02TD2593E:26b-34: de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya //
T02TD2593E:26b-37: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2593E:26b-38: lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
T02TD2593E:26b-39: sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02TD2593E:26b-40: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2593E:26b-41: nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis //
T02TD2593E:26b-42: sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor //
T02TD2593E:26b-43: khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang //
T02TD2593E:26b-44: sems can rnams la mi phan pa //
T02TD2593E:26b-45: nyams pa chen por 'gyur kyang ni //
T02TD2593E:26b-46: bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2593E:26b-47: de nas bkra shis brjod bya zhing //
T02TD2593E:26b-48: zhes bya bas dbang bskur zin nas bkra shis brjod bar bya ste /
T02TD2593E:26b-49: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02TD2593E:27a-2: sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD2593E:27a-3: bkra shis de ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o //
T02TD2593E:27a-4: de yis nye bar ba stan pa mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2593E:27a-5: 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD2593E:27a-6: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa //
T02TD2593E:27a-7: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2593E:27a-8: dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug / mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas //
T02TD2593E:27a-9: tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi //
T02TD2593E:27a-10: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o //
T02TD2593E:27a-11: rgyal ba bzhin du 'gying bcas pas //
T02TD2593E:27a-12: g-yog dang ldan pas slob dpon la //
T02TD2593E:27a-13: lan gsum bskor bas tshigs bcad kyis //
T02TD2593E:27a-14: bla ma de ni gzengs bstod bya //
T02TD2593E:27a-15: kye bdag ni rim pas dbugs phyung ste //
T02TD2593E:27a-16: mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la dgod //
T02TD2593E:27a-17: sa la nges par dbang bskur te //
T02TD2593E:27a-18: shin tu gzi ldan bkra shis mchog / ces brjod pas gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD2593E:27a-19: de nas rang yang khyim du 'gro //
T02TD2593E:27a-20: khyim du phyin nas 'khor dag la //
T02TD2593E:27a-21: slob dpon 'di ni dam tshig pas //
T02TD2593E:27a-22: bdag kyang dam tshig mchog dang ldan //
T02TD2593E:27a-23: 'di la rim gro phun sum tshogs //
T02TD2593E:27a-24: rta dang glang po nor dang 'bru //
T02TD2593E:27a-25: rin po che dang ci bzhed pa //
T02TD2593E:27a-26: khyed cag nga la ma 'dri bar //
T02TD2593E:27a-27: slob dpon 'di la de phyir phul //
T02TD2593E:27a-29: bla ma la yon dbul ba dang /
T02TD2593E:27a-31: sprul pa rang la bsdu ba dang //
T02TD2593E:27a-32: tshon phyag cing dkyil 'khor gyi rdzas la sogs pa ji ltar bya ba'i rim pa ba stan pa ni /
T02TD2593E:27a-34: bla ma la ni gus bcas yon //
T02TD2593E:27a-35: rjes mthun khyod kyis spyin par bya //
T02TD2593E:27a-36: des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
T02TD2593E:27a-38: rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni //
T02TD2593E:27a-39: spyin min bu dang chung ma dang //
T02TD2593E:27a-40: rang srog gis rtag brten byas na //
T02TD2593E:27a-41: longs spyod g-yo bas smos ci dgos //
T02TD2593E:27a-42: gang phyir bskal pa bye ba ni //
T02TD2593E:27a-43: grangs med par yang rnyed dka' ba'i //
T02TD2593E:27a-44: sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtsod ldan la //
