T02TD2593E:30b-0: gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun @30b gshegs te //
T02TD2593E:30b-1: 'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2593E:30b-2: zhes brjod la ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:30b-3: de nas zhag drug pa la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su /
T02TD2593E:30b-4: zhi ba'i thab bcas te til nag pos sdig pa spyang ba'i spyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2593E:30b-5: de nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir 'dud nyi shus bstod pa bya'o //
T02TD2593E:30b-6: de dag ni ro sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2593E:30b-7: de nas sngon gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2593E:30b-8: cho ga rnams ni spyad par bya //
T02TD2593E:30b-9: dang po'i cho ga'i rim pa nas //
T02TD2593E:30b-11: phyi rol phyung ste gtor ma spyin //
T02TD2593E:30b-12: de nas khrus byas mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2593E:30b-13: ma lus par ni 'dir bshad do //
T02TD2593E:30b-14: de nas phyi yi rim ldan pas //
T02TD2593E:30b-15: sngags pa chas gos ldan pa yis //
T02TD2593E:30b-16: shin tu bsgyings pas brgyan byas te //
T02TD2593E:30b-17: zhag bdun nang par spyin sreg bya //
T02TD2593E:30b-18: mi nyid shi ba'i gnas byas te //
T02TD2593E:30b-19: shi la phan pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02TD2593E:30b-20: gzhal yas khang pa de 'dra ba //
T02TD2593E:30b-21: 'di la gsungs te gzhan du min //
T02TD2593E:30b-22: 'di ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga ni //
T02TD2593E:30b-23: bdag gis rang bzor ma byas te //
T02TD2593E:30b-25: cho ga 'dus pa'i rgyud las te //
T02TD2593E:30b-28: shi ba la phan gdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas /
T02TD2593E:30b-29: ro spyin sreg chen pos spyang ba ste /
T02TD2593E:30b-30: de yang de nas zhag bdun pa la ro dkyil 'khor chen pos spyang ba'i phyir /
T02TD2593E:30b-31: slob dpon rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la //
T02TD2593E:30b-32: dang por gtor ma btang la /
T02TD2593E:30b-33: de nas sa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2593E:30b-35: rdul tshon 'bri ba gzhung bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2593E:30b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsreg khang brtsigs pa dang /
T02TD2593E:30b-37: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgyas dgod pa dang /
T02TD2593E:30b-39: mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bkug la /
T02TD2593E:30b-40: de nas ro bsreg khang du drangs te /
T02TD2593E:30b-41: bsreg khang la lan gsum bskor la /
T02TD2593E:30b-42: shar phyogs nas nang du gzhug / de nas slob dpon gyis /
T02TD2593E:30b-43: dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin nas bzung ste /
T02TD2593E:30b-44: yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yan chad bsgoms la /
T02TD2593E:30b-45: dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa rdzogs par byas te /
T02TD2593E:31a-1: g-yab kyis me sbar la me'i pra brtag ste /
T02TD2593E:31a-2: dam tshig gi me lha bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-3: mtshan nyid kyi me lha spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-4: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bstod pa dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-5: dgug gzhug bcing bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-9: mchod pa dang bsreg rdzas phul ba yan chod byas pa ni me lha'i mchod pa'o //
T02TD2593E:31a-10: de nas me lha'i thugs kar yi ge bhr'um las pho brang rim pa gsum dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgoms la /
T02TD2593E:31a-11: thab tu me tog re dor zhing /
T02TD2593E:31a-12: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor nas me lha'i thugs kar re mos sam dus gcig tu spyan drangs te /
T02TD2593E:31a-13: bsreg rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2593E:31a-14: de nas mjug gi cho ga ni /
T02TD2593E:31a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-17: phyag rgya dgrol cing ye shes gshegs pa dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-18: bskyed pa snying gar bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-19: phur bu gdon zhing phyogs skyong gso ba dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-20: mchod rdzas la sogs pa bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-21: dam nam dang rdul tshon phyags la /
T02TD2593E:31a-22: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas spyan drangs la /
T02TD2593E:31a-23: chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2593E:31a-24: de nas pa'i rnam pa lngas skyang nul byas la /
T02TD2593E:31a-25: thig la sogs pa mi mthong bar byas la /
T02TD2593E:31a-26: dkyil 'khor gyi thog tu spyan gzigs dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-27: sder bzangs la sogs pa bzhag nas bkra shis brjod la /
T02TD2593E:31a-29: dkyil 'khor du phul ba'i yo byad rnams ni slob dpon ba skyer bar bya'o //
T02TD2593E:31a-30: de dag ni ngan song nas drang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2593E:31a-31: byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:31a-34: de nas phyi de nang par ram zhag gsum na yang rung ste /
T02TD2593E:31a-36: dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyud chen po'am bye ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs rgyud chen po nas byung ba bzhin du tsha tsha btab la /
T02TD2593E:31a-37: tsha tsha dang po btab pa dang ming byang la /
T02TD2593E:31a-38: yid kyis dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-40: yang na slob ma gson po ji ltar 'jug pa ltar dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2593E:31a-41: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2593E:31b-0: slob dpon du dbang @31b bskur ba dang /
T02TD2593E:31b-1: rjes su ngang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2593E:31b-2: de nas de la lam ba stan bya //
T02TD2593E:31b-3: tshogs bsags dge ba'i don la spyar //
T02TD2593E:31b-4: zhes bya bas shi ba'i lam ba stan par bya ba ston te /
T02TD2593E:31b-5: rdo rje slob dpon gyis me tog gcig gyen du 'phangs te /
T02TD2593E:31b-6: song cig song cig rigs kyi bu //
T02TD2593E:31b-7: tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam //
T02TD2593E:31b-8: mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam /
T02TD2593E:31b-9: byang chub bar chad med pa'i lam //
T02TD2593E:31b-10: mdor na lam ni de rnams su //
T02TD2593E:31b-11: zhugs nas byang chub thob gyur cig / ces bya'o //
T02TD2593E:31b-12: de nas shi ba'i don du spyin gtong rgya chen po bya ste /
T02TD2593E:31b-13: tsha tsha gshegs su gzhug go //
T02TD2593E:31b-14: ro spyin sreg chen pos spyang ba'o //
T02TD2593E:31b-16: rdo rje dril bu lag par spyin //
T02TD2593E:31b-17: mgo la dbu rgyan bskon par bya //
T02TD2593E:31b-18: rdo rje sdom pa rnams byin te /
T02TD2593E:31b-19: bum pa'i dbang bskur rnams byin la //
T02TD2593E:31b-20: mig sogs rdo rje gti mug sogs //
T02TD2593E:31b-21: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod //
T02TD2593E:31b-22: rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor gyis //
T02TD2593E:31b-23: 'du byed rab tu bya bar ba stan //
T02TD2593E:31b-24: nyi ma gsum ni lon pa na //
T02TD2593E:31b-25: rus pa'i phreng ba bsdus byas la //
T02TD2593E:31b-26: dri dang 'o mas bran nas ni //
T02TD2593E:31b-27: de yis mchod rten du bya ba'o //
T02TD2593E:31b-29: de mthar de nyid rtag bsgom dang //
T02TD2593E:31b-31: rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gong thams cad kyi rim par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin ston te /
T02TD2593E:31b-32: spyir cho ga'i rim pa thams cad zin nas /
T02TD2593E:31b-34: thun la mi 'jug kyang rung ste /
T02TD2593E:31b-36: de nas gzhal yas khang lha la bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2593E:31b-37: lha thams cad kyang gtso bo la bsdus la yig 'brur bsgom mo //
T02TD2593E:31b-38: yig 'bru ni thams cad kyi ngo bo aa ste /
T02TD2593E:31b-39: aa stong pa nyid las skad cig mas lhar dran par byas nas /
T02TD2593E:31b-40: dge ba'i las rnams bya bar ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2593E:31b-41: de nas 'khor lo ba stan par bya //
T02TD2593E:31b-43: shes rab 'khor lor grags pa yin //
T02TD2593E:31b-44: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2593E:31b-45: dkyus nyid gsal ba'i phyir ma bkrol lo //
T02TD2593E:31b-46: de yang shin tu zab pa dang /
T02TD2593E:31b-47: bla ma la rag las pa'i man ngag ston te /
T02TD2593E:32a-0: de yang dang por bdag nyid khams dang zas snyoms par 'du @32a * //
T02TD2593E:32a-2: gnas bsam gtan gyi tsher ma med par skyil krung bcas la lag pa g-yon gyi steng du g-yas bzhag la dbang par bkan te /
T02TD2593E:32a-3: sgal ba'i steng du sgal ba gzhag la /
T02TD2593E:32a-4: mig sna gong du phab la so spyar la ma reg par byas la lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
T02TD2593E:32a-5: rtsa'i 'khor lo bzhi ye rang chas su lus la yod pa dkyus bzhin gsal btab la /
T02TD2593E:32a-6: de nas dang por lte ba'i 'khor lo la sems rtse gcig tu gtang la bsgom /
T02TD2593E:32a-7: de gsal nas de bzhin du snying ga dang mgrin pa dang /
T02TD2593E:32a-8: mtshog ma rnams rim gyis gsal bar bsgoms la /
T02TD2593E:32a-10: mdoms mer rlung dang me bsams te /
T02TD2593E:32a-11: rlung gis me sbar te rtsa g-yas na mar zhugs /
T02TD2593E:32a-12: lte ba'i 'khor lo bde ba'i thig ler zhu /
T02TD2593E:32a-13: de bzhin du me rlung gis phul te snying ga dang mgrin pa dang /
T02TD2593E:32a-14: mchog ma rnams rim gyis bzhu nas /
T02TD2593E:32a-15: lus thams cad bde ba'i thig les gang bar bsam zhing /
T02TD2593E:32a-16: blo bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2593E:32a-17: me ni gnas der langs so zhes bya'o //
T02TD2593E:32a-18: de nas spyi bo'i ham las mes zhu bas thig le'i bde ba rtsa g-yon mar bab nas /
T02TD2593E:32a-19: dang por mtshog ma'i 'khor lo gsos te /
T02TD2593E:32a-20: sngon bzhin du 'khor lo nyid du gyur par bsam mo ;
T02TD2593E:32a-21: ; de bzhin du mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba'i 'khor lo rnams rim gyis gsal bar bsam mo //
T02TD2593E:32a-22: de ltar yang nas yang du rtse gcig gi sems kyis goms pas zhi gnas kyi bde ba skye bar 'gyur ba ni man ngag go /
T02TD2593E:32a-23: 'di ltar rtag tu gang bsgom pa //
T02TD2593E:32a-25: de dag ni shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis /
T02TD2593E:32a-26: shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i phan yon ba stan te /
T02TD2593E:32a-27: dkyus nyid gsal bas 'dir ma bkrol lo //
T02TD2593E:32a-28: sangs rgyas kun ngang thabs cig pa'i //
T02TD2593E:32a-30: mi dpya dang mtshungs sems dang ldan par shog / des bya ba'i bar gyis slob dpon gyis ji ltar brtsams pa dang /
T02TD2593E:32a-31: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba ba stan pa ste sla bas de nyid kyi phyir ma bkrol lo //
T02TD2593E:32a-32: 'di bsdus dge rtsa gang yod des /
T02TD2593E:32a-33: 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal mthong shog / gsang ba'i dka' 'grel bshad pa don bsdus sgron ma rdzogs so //
T02TD2593E:32b-0: rgya gar gyi mkhan po de b'a ka ra tsandra @32b dang ;
T02TD2593E:32b-1: lo tsa ba klog skyas bsgyur ba'o//
